Reviews.Title: Shurhold GoPro Camera Adapter
Reviews.Author: Jim C So Cal "Go Kings"
Reviews.Content: This adapter snaps into the Shurhold 9' pole and feels very secure. I have confidence that the camera will not come lose from the pole.

Reviews.Title: Heavy Duty and a Great Match for Shurhold Pole & GoPro
Reviews.Author: Richard Williams
Reviews.Content: Shipment was quick with Prime, packaging was fine. etc.  No side to side motion at the end, which is good, I bought it for use with my GoPro cameras (using the 6' Shurhold pole which is also top notch).  The only negative to this unit is the nut is not captive so you must be careful not to lose it, but if you do a standard nut from your other GoPro accessories should remedy the issue.
